there is love we have barely tasted so much time we've wasted apart, come forget yesterday forgive the times i've turned away, there naever was a time i didn't love you there never was a time i didnt care, you were the music i heard each night my heart always knew you were there.

talk to me can you say forever speak the words that you've never said, don't hold back anymore this is chance we've waited for, there never was a time i didn't love you there never was atime i didn't care, i was a fool not to trust my heart my heart always knew you were there.

god give us time to grow closer give us that night we never knew, yesterday i held on to wishes today i can hold on to you.... there never was a time i didn't love you there never was a time i didn't care, i was afraid but my heart held on held on to aa dream and a prayer... my heart... always knew... you were there

umm yeah so i should probably get to work on my biology? sit on my bed and eat and watch tv while talking to ppl on aim
bye bye
